thread.title: Tracy Morgan, Jimmy Kimmel tour the zoo
thread.title_full: Tracy Morgan, Jimmy Kimmel tour the zoo

title: Tracy Morgan, Jimmy Kimmel tour the zoo
text:
Tracy Morgan And Jimmy Kimmel Take A Hilarious Zoo Tour Ben Lawson , Meredith Miles 7:02 AM, Oct 21, 2015 
Photo Credit: Getty Images / Ethan Miller 
Tracy Morgan is finally back after that horrible car accident last year. His celebratory return to show business already included a stop by "Saturday Night Live" last week. And he just stopped by "Jimmy Kimmel Live" to show off a recent big purchase â€” the Bronx Zoo. 
"What's the difference between a bison and a buffalo?" Jimmy Kimmel asked on "Jimmy Kimmel Live." 
"They don't make bison spicy hot wings, they make buffalo wings," Tracy Morgan said. 
Apparently, owning a zoo doesn't exactly make you a zoologist. Tracy did have some interesting facts about the animals' diets, though. 
"What do they eat?" Guillermo asked. 
"Some of them eat Big Mac meals, and a lot of them like White Castle," Tracy said. 
"They eat White Castle?" Jimmy asked. 
"Yeah. This one right here is from the West Coast, so he loves Fatburgers," Tracy said. 
He should probably just stick to comedy. 
This video includes images from Getty Images.
